page.title: 15FRUIT AND VEGETABLES
page.content: Quite a number of people shop at Presto or Hintons.They are supermarkets and have everything we need,including all the groceries, fresh fruit and vegetables, bread and cakes, soft drinks, pet food and ice cream. You go around with your trolley and take what you need from the shelves.If there is something you cannot find, you can ask someone who works there or look at the cards hanging over the shelves showing you where things are, with pictures. After you have paid for everything, you wheel your trolley outside to the car park. Our family goes to a supermarket because the prices are cheaper, there is a big car park and some days they are open until eight in the evening.
